title: Advertisement, "Restaurant Florent:  Hunger", 1990
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: In the center is an image of an animal bone, stripped of meat, on a china plate with a decorative rim. Above that is Hunger, imprinted in bold capitals. In the bottom left hand corner is: give to/ Holy Apostle Soup Kitchen, followed by two lines of address and phone number and a third line, Send contributiions or volunteer your time. In the opposite corner is: eat at Restaurant Florent, followed by two lines of address, open hours, and telephone and a third line, Come and celebrate your good deed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Advertisement, "Restaurant Florent:  Hunger", 1990.
1990. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-315.
